nodes.text: Quorealists were Yuuzhan Vong that believed Supreme Overlord Quoreal was right in not wanting to invade the galaxy and opposed Shimrra Jamaane's ascension as Supreme Overlord of the Yuuzhan Vong. They believed that Quoreal and his Priests were right about Zonama Sekot being able to destroy the Yuuzhan Vong. When Shimrra erased knowledge of the living world's discovery, the Quorealists were among the few who kepts records of its existence.

When the invasion began with many victories, the Quorealists ceased their concerns, believing that Shimrra may have been right in overthrowning Quoreal. However, as the Jeedai heresy spread, and the World Brain continued to sabotage the Vongforming of Coruscant into Yuuzhan'tar, the Quorealists again became vocal.

Drathul, as High Prefect of the Intendant caste, was the highest ranking known Quorealist among the Elite. Harrar may also have been a Quorealist. Czulkang Lah, former Warmaster and close acquiantance of Harrar, had also expressed opposition to invading the Galaxy, but it is unknown if he sided with the Quorealists.
